"A.P.241/3/22/10:30": "<%me>. Hey, over here! Good morning, how are you?"
"Ah, I forgot to introduce myself! I'm Xiera, your personal operator! Nice to meet you!"
"I'm glad that you woke up without any problems."
"Do you feel strange anywhere? Signs of Darker Factor... Nope, all clean!"
"Hmm? That head tilt. Could it be that your memories are mixed up?"
"This has happened a lot. We've already received contact from the medical unit."
"I know you just woke up, but I, your personal operator, Xiera... Will fill you in on the current situation!"
"On A.P.238/2/20, you were enlisted, as ARKS, to complete a mission on planet Naberius."
"Would you like to skip this tutorial?"
